title: Britney Spears has sent her love and support to her niece, and this whole situation is breaking our hearts
text:
Britney Spears has sent her love and support to her niece, and this whole situation is breaking our hearts We can’t imagine what the Spears the family is going through right now, and now Britney has sent her love and support to her niece.
It was reported yesterday (February 6th) that Jamie Lynn Spears’ daughter, Maddie , had been involved in an accident and had been rushed to hospital . Maddie had reportedly been riding an ATV vehicle and had crashed into a lake after trying to avoid a drainage ditch. In a report obtained by People , the Tangipahoa Parish Sheriff, Daniel Edwards said:
“ The ATV and child were instantly submerged in the water right before [her parents’] eyes. Within seconds the child’s mother, stepfather and other family members reached the pond, dove in and attempted to rescue the child to no avail. The child was trapped and secured by the seatbelt and the ATV’s safety netting. 
“Within two minutes, Acadian Ambulance Services arrived and assisted in freeing the child from the cold waters.” 
It’s been reported that 8-year-old Maddie was airlifted to a hospital in New Orleans, and is in a critical but stable condition.
Now Maddie’s aunt, pop singer Britney Spears, has sent a request out to her fans. Taking to social media, the 35-year-old mother of two shared a picture of Maddie, and wrote:
“Need all the wishes and prayers for my niece .” Need all the wishes and prayers for my niece pic.twitter.com/lTlVQmNEh5 
— Britney Spears (@britneyspears) February 6, 2017 It’s also been reported that Britney has flown home to Louisiana to be with her family.
Jamie Lynn, who is 10 years Britney’s junior, opened up about what it was like having becoming pregnant at 16, and spoke about her decision to raise Maddie outside of the media spotlight.
Church Lunch Family 
A photo posted by Jamie Lynn Spears (@jamielynnspears) on Nov 13, 2016 at 10:29am PST 
“She’s got such a sweet little heart,” she said to People . “I feel like I’ve raised her with a lot of honesty, but I’ve also raised her with a lot of love. She’s a very happy, content little girl, and there’s nothing more a parent could ask for. That’s my most proud accomplishment out of anything and always will be.” 
At my sisters show! @jamielynnspears is playing the LA County Fair in Pomona tonight. pic.twitter.com/mFB4QiAeDs 
— Britney Spears (@britneyspears) September 2, 2014 Jamie Lynn and Britney’s father, Jamie (Maddie’s grandfather), spoke to Entertainment Tonight , where he echoed Britney’s sentiments.
“All I can say is pray for our baby Maddie,” he said. All of our thoughts and prayers are with the family during what is surely this very scary time.
